activities: We sell a commercial software platform to life sciences manufacturers, and we provide support and software development services on the platform.  In connection with providing such services, our developers and quality assurance personnel may have incidental access to such personal information stored within the platform.  We do not access, use or disclose personal information for purposes other than supporting our customers use of the software.
